title: Angular Directive Schema
description: Creates a new, generic Angular directive definition in the given or default project.

path.description: The path at which to create the directive file, relative to the selected project (/src/(lib|app)/<relative_path>) or relative to workspace (<root_workspace>/<relative_path>).

name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the directive?

prefix.description: A prefix to apply to generated selectors.

skipTests.description: Do not create "spec.ts" test files for the new class.

selector.description: The HTML selector to use for this directive.
